Package org.springframework.test.web.support

package org.springframework.test.web.support
Support classes for testing web applications.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.springframework.test.web
    Helper classes for unit tests based on Spring's web support.
    org.springframework.test.web.client
    Contains client-side REST testing support.
    org.springframework.test.web.servlet
    Contains server-side support for testing Spring MVC applications.
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractCookieAssertions<E,R>
    Assertions on cookies of the response.
    AbstractHeaderAssertions<E,R>
    Assertions on headers of the response.
    AbstractJsonPathAssertions<B>
    Base class for applying JsonPath assertions in RestTestClient and WebTestClient.
    AbstractStatusAssertions<E,R>
    Assertions on the response status.
    AbstractXpathAssertions<B>
    Base class for applying XPath assertions in RestTestClient and WebTestClient.
    AbstractXpathAssertions.CheckedExceptionTask
    Lets us be able to use lambda expressions that could throw checked exceptions, since XpathExpectationsHelper throws Exception on its methods.
